name: Coming From the Sky
description:
This is my first Game, my entry for the Brackeys game jam 2022.2.

I made the game with my friend, so we were two.

The game is about exploring and helping people in need, and having allies coming from the sky ;)

I Hope you will enjoy it !

How to play :

Move : Q/D or Arrow keys

Jump : Space

Shoot : Left mouse Button

Charge Shoot : Right mouse Button (launch on release)

Shield : Scroll Wheel Button
